height.translation[0].definitions[0].def: how tall someone or something is
height.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Sam’s about the same height as his sister now.
State your age, height, and weight.
None of these sculptures was less than three metres in height.
six feet/ten metres etc in height
Sunflowers can grow to a height of 15 feet.
a height of six feet/ten metres etc
height.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the distance something is above the ground
height.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: It’s a miracle she didn’t break her neck falling from that height.
The aircraft was flying at a height of 10,000 metres.
a height of 2,500 feet/10,000 metres etc
The plane was rapidly losing height.
height.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a place or position that is a long way above the ground
height.translation[0].definitions[2].not: have a head for heights (=not be afraid of heights)
height.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Rachel had always been scared of heights.
a bird that opens shellfish by dropping them from a height onto rocks
height.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a particular high place – used especially in place names
